Title: The Reluctant Taxidermist
Writer: Bryan Cranston (created by), A.M. Reid, A.M. Reid, Max Reid, Max Reid, David Shore (created by)
Actors: Giovanni Ribisi, Marin Ireland, Margo Martindale, Peter Gerety
Plot: The location of the money revealed, Marius makes a bold move to snatch it all for himself, but Maggie and Luka are not so easily fooled. Taylor makes plans to frame the hitman for Winslow's...
